title: Data Utilization Strategies for Instructional Design: A Qualitative Research-Based Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Basic instructional design theories and understanding of the ADDIE model
context.additional_context: Advanced language education program design competency-building course for working professionals

learning_goals: Learners can establish data collection plans at each stage of the ADDIE model
Learners can make instructional design decisions utilizing diverse data sources (user experience, log data, etc.)
Learners can systematically analyze and apply qualitative data in the project evaluation phase
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
